channel.title: Hideo Kojima and other "key devs" supposedly leaving Konami after MGSV
channel.description:
[url]https://www.gamespot.com/articles/kojima-expected-to-leave-konami-after-mgs5-inside-/1100-6426024/[/url]
Apparently Kojima didn't really want to make the last few MGS games, but the way he's talked about 5, it seems like this was the game he had always wanted to make. Not sure if this is Kojima's doing or if he and Konami were having some misunderstandings. Not sure what'll end up happening with the new Silent Hill and MGO (though I imagine MGO wouldn't be affected since it's a separate team anyway). Also sucks for people who wanted a new ZoE game.

item.title: Hideo Kojima and other "key devs" supposedly leaving Konami after MGSV
item.dc:creator: Grach
item.description:
So this is completely accurate?

Read full topic

item.description:
^Konami put a lock on his and his team’s communications.

item.source: Hideo Kojima and other "key devs" supposedly leaving Konami after MGSV

item.title: Hideo Kojima and other "key devs" supposedly leaving Konami after MGSV
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Kojima has not been heard from for days now, and his usually-bustling twitter account hasn’t had even so much as a single food pic posted on it since the 18th.
I hope he’s alright.

Read full topic
item.source: Hideo Kojima and other "key devs" supposedly leaving Konami after MGSV

item.title: Hideo Kojima and other "key devs" supposedly leaving Konami after MGSV
item.dc:creator: Grach
item.description:
Kairouseki:

Doubt it. Konami also gets to keep the Fox Engine, which Kojima and his team spent forever making. So they get to make one game on it and then it’s going to be used from now on for PES and MGS knock-offs.

That’s bullshit.

So I guess Kojima will finally fulfill his dream of not working on another Metal Gear game. Wonder what will happen to Silent Hills though.

Read full topic
item.source: Hideo Kojima and other "key devs" supposedly leaving Konami after MGSV

item.title: Hideo Kojima and other "key devs" supposedly leaving Konami after MGSV
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
Dotard:

Does he keep the rights to some of the IPs or not?

Doubt it. Konami also gets to keep the Fox Engine, which Kojima and his team spent forever making. So they get to make one game on it and then it’s going to be used from now on for PES and MGS knock-offs.

Read full topic
item.source: Hideo Kojima and other "key devs" supposedly leaving Konami after MGSV

item.title: Hideo Kojima and other "key devs" supposedly leaving Konami after MGSV
item.dc:creator: bkdale86
item.description:
If I had to guess I’d say he doesn’t…unless he was the company founder. Most IP is generated for a company and they hold the rights (since they invested all the money for it.)
